001package com.technototes.library.hardware;
002
003import static com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice.hardwareMap;
004
005import java.util.HashMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import javax.annotation.Nullable;
008
009import com.qualcomm.ftccommon.SoundPlayer;
010
011public class Speaker {
012    private final Map<String, Integer> list;
013
014    private String currentSong = null;
015
016    public Speaker(String... songs) {
017        this(1f, songs);
018    }
019
020    public Speaker(float volume, String... songs) {
021        list = new HashMap<>();
022        addSongs(songs);
023        setVolume(volume);
024    }
025
026    public Speaker addSongs(String... name) {
027        for (String s : name) {
028            list.put(
029                    s,
030                    hardwareMap
031                            .appContext
032                            .getResources()
033                            .getIdentifier(s, "raw", hardwareMap.appContext.getPackageName()));
034        }
035        return this;
036    }
037
038    public Speaker start(String name) {
039        SoundPlayer.getInstance().startPlaying(hardwareMap.appContext, list.get(name));
040        currentSong = name;
041        return this;
042    }
043
044    public Speaker stop() {
045        SoundPlayer.getInstance().stopPlayingAll();
046        currentSong = null;
047        return this;
048    }
049
050    public Speaker setVolume(float volume) {
051        SoundPlayer.getInstance().setMasterVolume(volume);
052        return this;
053    }
054
055    public float getVolume() {
056        return SoundPlayer.getInstance().getMasterVolume();
057    }
058
059    @Nullable public String getCurrentSong() {
060        return currentSong;
061    }
062}
